title: Help again! 1934 German Olympic Tobaccoo cards
author: Rekal248

posts.post_title: Help again! 1934 German Olympic Tobaccoo cards
posts.post_content: I have 27 german tobaccoo cards . They are olympic cards. Cards are black and white, 3x2. I have a card with Hilter standing right it the middle. Also how can i post pics ? If i can. Im a new user and not sure how to use this yet. Also how can i find my old post? If some one can help me out, that would be great!! Thank you:D
You will probably get more + better responses if you post your question on the main forum instead of the BST forum. Good luck!
